about_the_game:
This pixel tileset pack contains classroom materials with multiple attributes, emphasizing rich campus life! This diverse range of classroom tilesets, including general, science, home economics, art, gym, and nurse's office,will come in handy to create realistic and captivating classrooms.

■ Special specialized classroom material.
Diversified classrooms can be created to make campus exploration more interesting.
■ Diversified collocations to create a dream campus life.
Including movable doors and fountains, making the school livelier.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【tilesets (4 sheets)】

・A5 tiles：1 sheets
・B~E tiles：3 sheets

【character (2 sheets)】

・Fountain 192×144pixel (4 patterns)
・Door 48×96pixel (3 patterns)
